meanings.sent1: I picked a juicy prunello from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The prunello was delicious and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The prunello rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The prunello's deep color reminded me of a sunset.
meanings.sent5: The prunello's skin was smooth and shiny.

meanings.definition: To prune or trim a tree or plant.
meanings.sent1: I carefully prunelloed the bushes in the garden.
meanings.sent2: It is important to prunello the branches to help the tree grow.
meanings.sent3: He prunelloed the hedge into the shape of a dinosaur.
meanings.sent4: She prunelloed away the dead leaves, revealing the beauty of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The gardener prunelloed with precision and skill.

meanings.definition: A type of fruit brandy made from prunes.
meanings.sent1: The bartender served a glass of prunello to the customer.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the smooth taste of prunello after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The prunello bottle had a fancy label with gold accents.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of prunello filled the room, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: He savored the warmth of prunello on a cold evening.
